artworks.title: Demo Photography I
artworks.description: A sample photograph showcasing the portfolio section.
artworks.bio: Captured in a quiet city alley, this piece focuses on the raw narrative potential of everyday urban scenes — part of an ongoing exploration of street photography as visual storytelling.

artworks.title: Demo Photography II
artworks.description: A placeholder work in progress within the photography section.
artworks.bio: This piece experiments with candid natural lighting in close-range portraiture — testing how spontaneity and subtle expression shape emotional intimacy in frame.

artworks.title: Demo Photography III
artworks.description: Another sample image demonstrating the photography portfolio.
artworks.bio: Shot during golden hour, this landscape study centers on balance and atmospheric depth — an exercise in precise horizon placement and mood-driven composition.
